title: WTB/WTT T206 Hindu or a T206 Gandil
author: wazoo

posts.post_title: WTB/WTT T206 Hindu or a T206 Gandil
posts.post_content: Looking for some more Brown Hindus. Maybe we can work out a trade? Or a cash/trade deal? Thank you. Let me know what you're looking for, or if you have an idea in mind.

The Tolstoi and Polar Bear are available:
[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/t206hound/t206-gandil/7435/all-cards[/IMG]
